sentences.en: Detritus usually consists of gravel, sand and clay.
sentences.cn: 岩屑通常是由砂砾, 沙和粘土组成的.

sentences.en: Exploiting detritus food chain is part of development system of grand agricultural re - sources.
sentences.cn: 开发腐屑食物链是大农业资源开发系统之一.

sentences.en: Flora of clay desert is similar to that of detritus desert.
sentences.cn: 粘土荒漠上的植物和碎石荒漠上的植物相似.

sentences.en: In the distance, the detritus of a century of oil exploration lines the horizon.
sentences.cn: 在远方地平线上，矗立着一个世纪以来开采石油产生的碎石堆。

sentences.en: Indeed, once this detritus of our ignorant past has been cleared away, we might see more clearly the nature of good, and pursue it aright at last.
sentences.cn: 的确，一旦当我们这些琐碎的无知正为过去，我们将看到更加清晰的自然地面目，并且永远追随正确的步伐。

sentences.en: It is not just Vanuatu that is benefiting from the detritus of war.
sentences.cn: 不只有万那杜从战争的堆积物中得到好处.

sentences.en: Most galaxies abound with interstellar gas and dust the detritus of countless generations of stars.
sentences.cn: 绝大多数星系有着丰富的星际气体和尘埃,这些都是无数代恒星散落下来的物质材料.

sentences.en: organic detritus from fish and plants
The profile is established in response to the amount and type of detritus available.
sentences.cn: 剖面的建立有赖于碎屑物补给的数量和类型.

sentences.en: Till - less agriculture Reserved detritus from previous crops covers and protects the seedbed.
sentences.cn: 保留前茬作物的残株碎片以保护苗床.

sentences.en: Today's coast is never clear but always strewn with plastic and other detritus.
sentences.cn: 今天的海岸不再空旷,但却四处散布着塑料品和其它碎屑.

sentences.en: We have emptied the bus of all our detritus.
sentences.cn: 我们把所有零碎东西从巴士上清理下来。

trans.tran_cn: （侵蚀形成的）岩屑，碎石，瓦砾，风化物
trans.tran_en: pieces of waste that remain after something has been broken up or used
